pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Approach via Pseudo-Value Information and Estimation // 'SOHPIE' (pronounced as SOFIE) is a novel pseudo-value regression approach for differential co-abundance network analysis of microbiome data, which can include additional clinical covariate in the model. The full methodological details can be found in Ahn S and Datta S (2023) arXiv:2303.13702v1.
